amendment.description: Amendment deletes language that withholds funds and restricts the designating of critical habitat on certain private lands in northern California.
amendment.purpose: An amendment similar to the amendment printed as amendment No. 3 in the Congressional Record of June 18, 1996, to delete the language in the bill that prohibits using federal funds to enforce the designation of any critical habitat for the Marbled Murrelet on private property in California.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Dicks amendment (A004) Agreed to by recorded vote: 257 - 164 (Roll no. 253).
